name: The League Of Racoons And The Snow Buried Casino
name_original: The League Of Racoons And The Snow Buried Casino
description:
Prove your worth to the racoon community by diving into the snow buried casino and having your head turned upside down and inside out in an attempt to save all the racoons lost to gambling...

A 2D Rogue Like every item comes with a helpful buff and a disorientating de-buff. Stay in the snow-buried casino as long as you can, dealing with confusing control changes and constantly growing in power guards to find every racoon.
